name: HOLD_OUT_VALIDATION
desc: Split datasets into random train and test subsets
label: Hold Out Validation for Galaxy

parameters.name: pathology
parameters.label: pathology
parameters.desc: The name of the pathology in which the dataset belongs to.

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.label: dataset
parameters.desc: The names of one or more datasets, in which the algorithm will be executed.

parameters.name: x
parameters.label: x
parameters.desc: Independent variables: A list of variables from database.

parameters.name: y
parameters.label: y
parameters.desc: Dependent variable: A categorical variable form database.

parameters.name: test_size
parameters.label: test_size
parameters.desc: (Optional). If it is between 0.0 and 1.0, it represents the proportion of the dataset to include in the test split. If it is not given, the value is set to the complement of the train size.

parameters.name: train_size
parameters.label: train_size
parameters.desc: (Optional). If it is between 0.0 and 1.0, it represents the proportion of the dataset to include in the train split. If None, the value is automatically set to the complement of the test size.

parameters.name: random_state
parameters.label: random_state
parameters.desc: (Optional). It is the seed used by the random number generator.

parameters.name: shuffle
parameters.label: shuffle
parameters.desc: (Optional). Whether or not to shuffle the data before splitting.
